content: difficulty level easy / intermediate this poncho is worked in the rounds top down yarn 3 skeins of scheepjes eliza 100 g hook 5 5 mm gauge 13 double_crochet = 10 cm and 7 row = 10 cm size one size if you use the same yarn and gauge as indicated in the pattern the poncho will have the approximately measurements as shown in the picture to the right this poncho is crocheted loosely so use a bigger hook if your gauge is too tight
